QuestData.Title: Secrets of the Scourge
QuestData.Description: Scrawled across the flesh-bound chapters of this tome are strange symbols and shapes that seem to have been scraped into the pages with a blade. You have no idea what is written, but you are certain that whatever it is, it must be important.$B$BDeliver the tome to Cavalier Durkon standing guard topside at Wintergarde Crypt.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Flesh-bound Tome to Cavalier Durkon at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.
QuestData.RewardText: Whatever information is held in this book must be of great importance! I could hear the howls and wails echoing through the crypt as you made your escape!$B$BThe High Commander must be notified!
